name: Remedies for breach of collateral contracts not impaired
text:
PART 7.  REMEDIES
 
     §490:2-701  Remedies for breach of collateral contracts not impaired.  Remedies for breach of any obligation or promise collateral or ancillary to a contract for sale are not impaired by the provisions of this article. [L 1965, c 208, §2-701; HRS §490:2-701]
